post.author: 이성기
post.content:
에이젼트들이 다음과 같은 사항의 계약직 개발자를 찾는군요. 관심이 있는 분은 저에게 연락주세요. 위치가 마캄이라서 제가 거절한 것인데, 아는 사람을 소개시켜달라고 합니다.
I currently have several positions available for Senior Java Developers in Toronto, Ontario (Canada). The position description is as follows:
Senior Java developers needed in Toronto, Ontario (Canada) with 6+ years of IT experience, 3+ years experience in Java/J2EE.
Candidates must also have: Websphere or Weblogic, Solaris, Oracle web applications. Developers will build financial web-based applications. Project involves developing new features for an on-line banking system.
Required Skills: 3+ yrs minimum in the following:Java/J2EE, Websphere, Solaris, XML, UML, JSP, Servlets, STRUTS, EJB, Oracle, SQLAbility to analyze and understand existing STRUTS frameworkMust be able to work on a corp-corp basis Preference will be given to candidates that currently reside in Markham/Toronto, are from Markham/Toronto, Canadian citizens, etc.
4-6 mo contract,
post.title: Senior Java Developers J2EE, Struts
